attributes.additional_details: Exemple of people who need this: Elderly vulnerable people. Proved disable people. Single mums to help them only until the child is one years old and offer them a nursery place after this age so that the mum can work. No housing benefits as if they can work therefore they can afford rent
attributes.background:
The benefits is wrecking this country. 
It’s time to end it. Only those who are in serious need should get it

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about the provision of certain types of support by the Government, but we're not sure if you want the Government to end all payments and support schemes (including benefits, pensions, grants for individuals and businesses), or only some.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
